snippet.title: Lya Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The first trailer of Lya (Lee-ah) the first game from Scary Stuff (™).

Available June 2019.

Check out the official Twitter @LyaOfficial3 and rpgmaker.net profile for more information.
